definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: The post-stage circuit is an asymmetrical half-bridge converter with zero–voltage switching features.
sentences.chinese: 後級電路爲具有零電壓切換的非對稱半橋轉換器。

sentences.english: Second inverter half-bridge inverter with coupled inductor topology.
sentences.chinese: 二次逆變採用耦合電感的半橋逆變電路拓撲。

sentences.english: In the main circuit, half-bridge inverter circuit was adopted to realize the interchange of the power.
sentences.chinese: 主電路中，採用了半橋逆變電路實現功率的變送。
